about_the_game:
Gameplay:
The game "I'm a Rocker" is basically a point & click adventure that uses elements of the hidden object genre to unfold the story. As you click, you will discover interactive objects, you will pick up inventory items that you can use elsewhere, and you must have conversations with the characters in the story. There's also a different aspect, and that's collecting CDs. This doesn't affect the plot, but getting them all will earn you a Steam Achievement. The story is not completely linear, some things can be done in a different order.

Background:
We are after a nuclear war, somewhere in the USA. Life is not kind to you, and your prospects are certainly not looking good. You're a metalhead, a member of a "different" thinking group, listening to "different" kind of music, a member of a rebellious subculture, who always has a slightly different opinion on things than society expects. In many ways, of course, you are the same as everyone else. You want to live a normal life, as much as possible, and you want to have fun. But in this world? You realize that your life might not be very long, so you want to go to one last concert of a famous metal band. The problem is, it's in another city not too close by, and you'd need a functioning vehicle to cross the wasteland. Maybe a partner wouldn't hurt either. So you decide to get to that concert, no matter what, and move mountains to get there.

Although the trailer shows Italian and Ukrainian language options, these two languages are not yet available.

content_descriptors.notes: It is a raw post-apocalyptic world with all its negative implications, but mainly only in terms of aftermath. The player neither participates nor assists in the execution of negative things, but rather the positives characterize his actions. There is a strong emphasis on solidarity and friendship.

name: I'm a Rocker!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 or better / AMD FX-8320 or better.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 (2GB) / AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB) or better.
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600K 3.6 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X 3.6 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 or AMD Radeon RX 590
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria
Conteúdo sexual

short_description: You are playing a metalhead in a post-apocalyptic point&click adventure game. Your wish is to go to one last metal concert, because who knows what tomorrow will bring. But to do that you need to create the conditions in the form of some equipment and a car.
